story_summary.description: One sentence neutral summary of what happened. Stick to basic undisputed facts only. Maximum 25 words.

trust_signal.description: Overall agreement level: high_agreement (most facts align), some_conflicts (minor contradictions), major_disputes (significant factual conflicts)

reader_action.description: One clear sentence telling reader what to do. Examples: 'Coverage is consistent across sources', 'Verify casualty numbers with additional sources', 'Be aware of different framings of this story'. Maximum 20 words.
